title: Modern GIS with Python: Beyond the Desktop

title: Welcome To My Academic Blog
text:
Welcome to the Spatial Geography Hub
Welcome to my updated personal website and blog! I am thrilled to share my journey as a geographer and spatial data scientist with a global community of researchers and developers.
This blog will serve as a space for: - Tutorials: Deep dives into Google Earth Engine, Python, and R for geospatial analysis. - Project Updates: Behind-the-scenes looks at the development of my innovations like geeadvance and deepgee. - Field Notes: Insights from workshops, research conventions, and academic fieldwork.
Since this is a platform for geographers, expect to see a lot of satellite imagery, code snippets, and spatial insights. Whether you are a student just starting with GIS or a professional looking for advanced AI-driven spatial tools, I hope you find this content valuable.
Feel free to leave comments using your GitHub account‚ÄîI look forward to engaging in technical discussions and collaborations!

title: Innovations
text:
### Spectral Reflectance Curve A tool for analyzing spectral signatures across multiple bands. Visit App


 ### Phenology Signature Crop classification tool based on phenological signatures. Visit App


 ### Flood Susceptibility AHP-based tool for flood susceptibility mapping. Visit App


 ### Odisha Flood Map Real-time flood mapping tool for the Odisha region. Visit App

title: Innovations
text:
Python Packages


 ### geeadvance Advanced functional tools for Google Earth Engine. PyPI


 ### deepgee Seamless integration of Deep Learning with Earth Engine. PyPI


 ### geeassist AI-powered coding assistant for the GEE playground. PyPI

title: Innovations
text:
Chrome Extensions


 ### GEE AI Assistant Enhance your GEE development with Gemini-powered AI. Chrome Web Store


 ### Quick Screenshot Capture and annotate screenshots directly in your browser. Chrome Web Store

title: Publications & Presentations
text:
Book: Modern Cartography Series Year: 2024 View Publication | Download PDF
This study analyzes agricultural drought in Paschim Medinipur, West Bengal, using Google Earth Engine with satellite and climate datasets from 2002‚Äì2022.



Book: Google Earth Engine and Artificial Intelligence for Earth Observation Year: 2025 View Publication | Download PDF
This study demonstrates the use of AHP in Google Earth Engine to identify vulnerable areas for flood hazards in Odisha.
